amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $59.8 million in funding for the Military Construction, Marine Corps portion of the OCO account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike paragraph providing funding for Military Construction, Navy and Marine Corps contained in Title IV of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 51 - 371 (Roll no. 218).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Mulvaney.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 51 - 371 (Roll no. 218).
